items.sentence: It seems that Tom doesn't really care what happens.

There were three Canadians at the party last night.
Are you saving money to buy something? If so, what?
Tom owns a barbecue restaurant with his wife, Mary.
We'll still be able to make it on time if we hurry.
I wonder whether Tom will ask me to do that or not.
Tom didn't know that Mary wouldn't be at his party.
Tom's doctor advised him to stay in bed for a week.
Everybody has to help do this if we are to succeed.
If Tom isn't here by noon, we'll leave without him.
Are there any other questions you'd like to ask me?
Maybe Tom could stop by your place on his way home.
There are already machines that can do that for us.
There's no point in arguing with someone like that.
I'd much rather spend time with Tom than with Mary.
You need to wear a helmet when riding a motorcycle.

The Internet has not exactly enlightened the world.
One hundred fifty people entered the marathon race.
There's no doubt that Tom was the one who did that.
If I were to live again, I'd like to be a musician.
Tom came in the house without taking his shoes off.
Tom came over to my desk and handed me an envelope.
Why do I still listen to you after all these years?
I don't eat bacon at night because it's too greasy.

I'm glad I'm not the only one who's wearing a suit.
The tallest mountain in the world is Mount Everest.

I don't understand why she doesn't love me anymore.

Tom's always criticizing Mary and putting her down.
I was forced to something that I didn't want to do.

Tom said he wished that he hadn't tried to do that.

Tom admitted that what he said earlier wasn't true.
